          <title>
            <string language="en">Brownian motion of dust particles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brownsche Bewegung der Staubpartikel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement brownien des particules de poussière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento brownian de partículas de poeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Moto browniano delle particelle di polvere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Του BROWN κίνηση των μορίων σκόνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento browniano de las partículas de polvo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the random path of a particle exhibiting Brownian motion.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dust particle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">random path</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den gelegentlichen Pfad 
eines Partikels, der Brownsche Bewegung ausstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la voie d'accès 
aléatoire d'une particule montrant le mouvement brownien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o trajeto aleatório de 
uma partícula que exibe o movimento brownian.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il percorso casuale di
una particella che esibisce il moto browniano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τυχαίο μονοπάτι ενός 
μορίου εκθέτοντας την του BROWN κίνηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el camino al azar de una
partícula que exhibe el movimiento browniano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Staubpartikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
